product_name: Chooze Dance Mary Jane Shoes - Toddler Girls'
long_description: These fun and unique Chooze Dance Mary Jane shoes for toddler girls will keep her jitterbugging all day long. As a Good Returns company, Chooze invests its profits in anti-poverty programs that provide training, support and loans to women so they can start their own businesses. Right and left shoes are matched, but patterns are never quite identical; each shoe is unique. 100% cotton fabric breathes well for comfort in warm weather. Rip-and-stick instep band secures the fit. Antimicrobial memory foam insoles offer step-in comfort and resist odors. Rubber outsoles on the Chooze Dance toddlers girls' shoes offer reliable grip on a variety of surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: These fun and unique Chooze Dance Mary Jane shoes for toddler girls will keep her jitterbugging all day long.
